name: Duels of Aether
description:
Take on the role of a Wizard as you enter the Aether to duel against D'Artagnan and his three minions.

Duels of Aether is an active-time-battle RPG where you duel against Enemy Wizards in one-on-one battles. Learn new spells from your defeated foes, and arrange your spellbook mindfully for each new foe.

Duels of Aether was created for BetaJam 2 in 2 weeks.

Controls:

Arrow Keys for movement in the Overworld & navigating menus.

ENTER to interact with objects in the Overworld & select in the menu.

Team:

Tom Malanowski - Programming & Development

J. Woolbert - Artist, Music & Development

M. Reynolds - Music
